content: I have a new IGuide that needs to reference two (possibly three) versions of FHIR. I have a copy of CRD that Lloyd and I worked on that referenced STU3 and R4. Going forward, will IG publishing support multiple FHIR versions in one guide or should I be making multiple separate guides?
multiple versions in one guide but it's a big chang, and not close
Not close as in not before next WGM?
don't think so. We'll be flat out getting templates done - and that's urgent
